House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08039
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR PUBLIC SALE SHARES IN THE DISPOSITION OF GOVERNMENT CORPORATIONS UNDER THE PRIVATIZATION PROGRAM
ABSTRACT : Provides that whenever government owned or controlled corporation or any of their assets are privatized, it shall be through a public offering of not less that 60 % of its shares of stock ; and no person shall own more than 5 % of the shares of stock of the corporation.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
